title: It took me 37 minutes to open the Support page.
body:
I'll be dead before I can submit a ticket, Jesus Christ.

Edit: Finally loads and this.

https://i.gyazo.com/49eb4b81046b446ecdcffd826bfee61b.png

Nothing is clickable. Godbless.

replies.body: When you can't contact support about how you can't contact support, something's wrong.
I _believe_ (do not by any stretch know) that they were updating the site and that's why it was so slow. I was having trouble as well. It's fine now for me, is it ok for you as well?

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HETu7PlE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-20T13:00:01.598+0000)
>
> I _believe_ (do not by any stretch know) that they were updating the site and that's why it was so slow. I was having trouble as well. It's fine now for me, is it ok for you as well?

No. It took long and I gave up.
